Sitecore Experience Accelerator (SXA) is a framework that enables parallel work streams and\r\n faster time to market. It provides reusable, templated UX layouts and components that are fully\r\n integrated into the Sitecore editing experience.

SXA uses a theme-based approach where you can create multiple themes for different sites or\r\n brands. Themes include CSS, JavaScript, and assets that define the look and feel of your site.\r\n You can easily switch between themes or create custom themes based on your requirements.
